reviewText: The VCI release is in "fake widescreen". They have taken a full frame print, squished it, then put mattes on the top and bottom. The image is distorted such that everyone looks short and fat. Not recommended.

A typical 70s generation gap film rife with stereotypical hippie vs backwoods morality.

The plot is based on new ideas vs the old establishment clichés / a small town son who moved to Hollywood became a satr decides to ride his motorcycle back to his redneck home town where it seems all the town folk hate his successful guts.

A little slow at times / but an interesting snap shot of time and small town atmosphere ripe with gloom.
